ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Eldrig the Old
ygData.msgSnippet: Perhaps he thinks since it s for other people s secondary characters that he s allowed to take it and sell it for himself or his own secondary characters. But
ygData.messageBody:
Perhaps he thinks since it's for other people's secondary characters that he's allowed to take it and sell it for himself or his own secondary characters. But if that were the case, then he should say that that is what he's doing and not just sneaking off and sell it.

It's not only rude to you and your guildmates, but to anyone else outside of the guild that he plays with. It'd make your guild look pretty bad if others are seeing this as well. And an officer?! Ugh.

I'm pretty uptight myself on things like this. I'm not a moral beacon by any means, but this is pretty bad.

It would be best to talk to him personally about it. I'd be careful about chatting with guildmates on this if your guild doesn't already have policies against behavior like this. I'm sure he has lots of other friends in the guild as well. Lots of good guilds have fallen apart on much smaller issues.

---Windleaf

On Wed, Jan 24, 2001 at 03:20:48PM -0700, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
> I guarantee that if I didn't know/socialize with him in RL that would be the
> case for me as well. The repeat incident and further borderline behavior
> has made me wonder how well I really know him after all.
>
> Kit
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Tatsukawa [mailto:windleaf@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 3:02 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Eldrig the Old
>
>
> Ooooh. If this mate was in my guild, he would have gotten booted the first
> time. Just heard a major rant last night from our Guildleader about mates
> not being civil to each other and anyone who wasn't would get booted, no
> appeal.
>
> While it's just a game, you are still dealing with people and this person is
> not honorable or honest at all. I'd never group with them personally.
>
> ---Windleaf
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
